title: Four-Level Maple Hive
description: Hand-made from soft maple, with four easy-access levels. Approximate dimensions are 2x2x4.

title: Gabled Four-Level Hive
description: Designed to weather well in wet climates. The roof is sloped to shed water, keeping your workers dry and cozy.

title: Hive Kit
description: Modular kit so you can build your own hive with as many levels as needed.

title: Hive Stand
description: Reduces rot by keeping your hives off the ground.

title: Safari Jump Suit
description: Stay sting-free with this full-body jump suit. Includes coveralls and safari-style veil.

title: Cowled Jump Suit
description: Stay sting-free with this full-body jump suit. Includes coveralls and cowl-style veil.

title: Cowled Smock
description: The smock and cowl-style veil keeps you free from stings from the waist up.

title: Handler Gloves
description: Made from real leather, these gloves stand up to even the toughest abuse.

title: Tubes of some sort
description: They may look like quarter rolls, but they're something bee related. I promise.

title: Smoker - Set of 2
description: Stainless steel bellowed smokers (x2) for pacifying your workers.

title: Smoker Pellets
description: Produces white smoke, safe for you and the bees.

title: Comb Knife
description: No-slip rubber grip for comfort. Perfectly shaped for extracting comb.

title: Comb Holder
description: Ensures a perfect grip on the comb and tray, every time.
